summary: ClearForm Organizations/Team Management feature testing complete. All 13 backend API tests passed. Frontend UI fully functional with Team Management card on dashboard, Create Organization dialog, Invite Member dialog, and 'ClearForm by Pleerity' branding.
seed_data_creation: Used existing test users and organization
context_for_next_testing_agent: ClearForm Organizations/Team Management is fully functional. Backend APIs at /api/clearform/organizations/* all working. Frontend pages /clearform/team and /clearform/organizations both route to ClearFormOrganizationsPage. Team Management card added to dashboard. 'ClearForm by Pleerity' branding with Pleerity logo consistent across all ClearForm pages. All 'Free Trial' references removed and replaced with 'Get Started'.

backend_api.POST /api/clearform/organizations: PASS - Creates new organization (blocked if user already owns one)
backend_api.duplicate_org_prevention: PASS - Users cannot create multiple orgs as owner

frontend_ui.dashboard_team_card: PASS - Team Management card visible on /clearform/dashboard
frontend_ui.org_stats_display: PASS - Shows Shared Credit Pool, Team Members, Pending Invitations
frontend_ui.members_list: PASS - Shows members with roles (OWNER badge)
frontend_ui.pending_invitations: PASS - Shows pending invitations with status
frontend_ui.invite_member_dialog: PASS - Opens with email, role, message fields
frontend_ui.create_org_dialog: PASS - Opens for users without org
frontend_ui.org_settings_display: PASS - Shows org name, type, user role, created date

branding.clearform_header: PASS - Shows 'ClearForm by Pleerity' with Pleerity logo
branding.pricing_page: PASS - Shows 'Get Started' instead of 'Free Trial'
